title: Schema for output measurement output file

oneOf.description: Arrays of (wire) pull strength in grams and grading

Name.description: Chip unique ID from chip config

ModuleSN.description: Module serial number in the production database

TimeStart.description: Unix time stamp of the start time

TimeStartString.description: date time string in YYYY-MM-DD_HHmmss format

TimeEnd.description: Unix time stamp of the end time
